channel.title: Posts on Jackiebin's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jackiebin's blog

item.title: Emacs_Skill
item.description:
1. emacs编辑c文件时，大括号的跳转

    C-M-n: Move forward over a parenthetical group (`forward-list’).

    C-M-p: Move backward over a parenthetical group (`backward-list’).

    C-M-u: Move up in parenthesis structure (`backward-up-list’).

    C-M-d: Move down in parenthesis structure (`down-list’).

item.title: First
item.description:
dotfiles

This is my dot files. I use stow to manage my dotfiles

1
2
3

git clone https://github.com/jackiebin/dotfiles.git ~/dotfiles
cd ~/dotfiles
stow zsh # ...and whatever else you want

zsh

  • oh-my-zsh

vim

  • vim-plug - to manage other plugins

Emacs

  1. Packages
  • Hydra
  • flycheck: Syntax checking
  • flyspell: Spell checking
    • sudo pacman -S aspell
  • langtool: English checking
    • sudo pacman -S languagetool
  • yatemplate: filetype template
    • M-x auto-insert
  • Ivy/swipper/counsel/company/helm
  1. C++
  • lsp
  • ccls:
    • sudo pacman -S ccls
  • ggtags:
    • sudo pacman -S global
  1. Python
  • lsp
    • sudo pip install ‘python-language-server[all]’
  1. Markdown: C-c C-s keywords
  • sudo pacman -S pandoc:
    • C-c C-c keywords
  • sudo pip install grip
    • C-c C-c g
  1. golang
  • sudo pacman -S go
  • zshrc: GOPATH,GOPROXY
  • go get golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest
  1. Java
  • sudo pacman -S maven
